Articles.Content: I have seem to forgotten what mono.dll is. The game crashed 5 minutes ago, and the log said that mono.dll caused a violation in mono.dll. I think it's a memory issue, but what's mono.dll again?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mono_(software)

The mono runtime is the important part.
Mostly a memory issue indeed. Try opening your game in opengl or dx11. It can also be that a mod is not updated. However, mostly the game crashes on startup in that case.
